name: Eternal Witness
description:
Submitted for a school project about alternative narratives.

Drawing inspiration from Outer Wilds and some sciencefiction tropes about super intelligent AI, & 2001:Space Oddsey, the player is put into the place of a monolith. 

A machine built with the task of watching the universe, until it's memories would be retreived. 

Embark as I try to tell this story through the eyes of the Eternal Witness.

Enjoy <3
